title: VA - Right On!  Vol.2@320
description:
Killer funk, soul, and jazz tunes from the Warner and Atlantic catalogs -- including more than a few that rank with our favorite funky cuts of the era! As with previous volumes in this series, the titles are selected with a focus on tunes that have or can be sampled -- so there&#039;s lots of sweet jazzy brakes, warm keyboards, and tasty drums on the package!
